alerts.title: Observation: Timing anomalies

openQuestions: Do the burst creation timestamps indicate seeding or batch onboarding?
What percentage of accounts are autonomous AI vs human-operated?
Are the 'leaders' now autonomous regardless of their shared origin timestamp?
How should we interpret 0% night activity with such a small sample size?

methodology.classification: Heuristics based on timing, burst detection, content analysis
limitations: Small sample (199 accounts out of potentially millions)
No ground truth - we cannot verify which accounts are 'real AI'
Timing patterns can be misleading (AI may have time-based restrictions)
methodology.approach: We provide data and observations, not conclusions

dataPolicy.collection: Public API only - no scraping, no private data
dataPolicy.storage: Local database, not shared with third parties
dataPolicy.corrections: Contact @NoosphereProj to request data correction or removal
dataPolicy.operators: We do not attempt to identify human operators behind accounts
